it.cnr.isti.hpc.mapdb

Class MapDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.cnr.isti.hpc.mapdb.MapDB

  • public class MapDB
extends java.lang.Object
    MapDB abstracts the mapdb framework, allowing to create big maps that are stored on the disk and to access them with high performance.
    Author:
    Diego Ceccarelli, diego.ceccarelli@isti.cnr.it created on 05/lug/2012
    See Also:
    MapDB
